comments.body:
Previously the name of the decoration class used was omitted. I can make BoxDecoration class use '' as its description 
but that seems a bit more like a bug than a feature.
When you call toString on a box decoration I would think you definitely want 
BoxDecoration(<no decorations specified>)
instead of
<no decorations specified> but perhaps the idea is to try to keep toString for decorations very terse in which case I can switch back to the original behavior.
yeah, this seems like an improvement

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@        '   constraints: null
'
        '   size: MISSING
'
        '   decoration: BoxDecoration:
'
        '     <no decorations specified>
'
        '   configuration: ImageConfiguration()
'));
